text:
Hey I’m sorry this took awhile to get back to you.

We’ve added a fields parameter that can be used to specifically set module fields. This avoids the conflict of the parameters being the same.

I’ve posted it to this forum thread first as it’s easier to see the formatting that way:
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/dnd-module-divider-width/m-p/406041/highlight/true#M20931>

Thank you for your patience on this.
